summary: Search for collections by metadata properties
description:
Searches for collections available on the current back-end by metadata properties and returns ids of collections that match all criteria. ``cube_property()`` can be used to get property values.

A single collection can be selected using array operations such as ``first()``, ``last()`` and ``array_element()`` and afterwards be loaded using ``load_collection()``.

expression.description: An expression that is evaluated against each collection the back-end offers.

returns.description: An array of matching collection ids.

items.description: Each element is a job id.
